job_title: Head of IT in Houghton Regis, England
pros:
Clear corporate direction
Excellent Management and Leadership structure
Competitive salary
Excellent work life balance
Work environment and friendly staff
cons: None that I can think of.

job_title: Resourcing Administrator in Houghton Regis, England
pros:
A very friendly place to work! The people are lovely and departments work well together.

Good location

Free Parking

Bright Building  - Open planned

Rising holiday entitlements - Up to 30 days 

Free wifi while at work

Personal postal facility 

Good staff breakout areas to relax or hold informal meetings
cons: Local shops are a fair walk or a short drive away
